metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12910 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The get_cookies function in soup-cookie-jar.c in libsoup 2.63.2 allows attackers to have unspecified impact via an empty hostname.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12910` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-soup-2.4 - 2.52.2-1ubuntu0.3
libsoup-gnome2.4-1 - 2.52.2-1ubuntu0.3
libsoup2.4-1 - 2.52.2-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsoup2.4 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.52.2-1ubuntu0.3').
